name: Trade – Giovanni and Tena-Junguito (2016)
title: Trade – Giovanni and Tena-Junguito (2016)

sources.name: Federico and Tena-Junguito (2016)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Federico, Giovanni and Antonio Tena-Junguito  (2016 b). 'A tale of two globalizations: gains from trade and openness 1800-2010'. London, Centre for Economic Policy Research. (CEPR WP.11128).
sources.dataPublisherSource: Various sources . Further details available in the online appendix of Federico Giovanni and Antonio Tena-Junguito (2016a) “World trade, 1800-1938: a new data-set” EHES Working paper n.93. http://www.ehes.org/EHES_93.pdf.

owidTags: Trade from Antiquity to Early Modern Times

fields.name: World Trade (relative to 1913) (Federico and Tena-Junguito (2016))
fields.description: Time series of value of world exports at constant prices, relative to 1913 (i.e. values correspond to world export volumes indexed at 1913=100)
